specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get the Ambush special rule.
specialRules.name: Darkness-Protocol
specialRules.label: Darkness-Protocol
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get the Ambush special rule.

specialRules.hint: For each unmodified result of 6 you roll to hit that hit is multiplied by 4.
specialRules.name: Flux
specialRules.label: Flux
specialRules.description: For each unmodified result of 6 you roll to hit that hit is multiplied by 4.

specialRules.hint: This model may block spells as if it had the Psychic(2) special rule. If it is a Psychic then it gets +2 to spell block rolls.
specialRules.name: Gloom-Protocol
specialRules.label: Gloom-Protocol
specialRules.description: This model may block spells as if it had the Psychic(2) special rule. If it is a Psychic then it gets +2 to spell block rolls.

specialRules.hint: On a round in which this unit arrives from Ambush it gets AP(+3).
specialRules.name: Hunter
specialRules.label: Hunter
specialRules.description: On a round in which this unit arrives from Ambush it gets AP(+3).

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit may ignore wounds from Regeneration on 4+.
specialRules.name: Regen-Protocol
specialRules.label: Regen-Protocol
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit may ignore wounds from Regeneration on 4+.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit may ignore the Slow special rule.
specialRules.name: Royal March
specialRules.label: Royal March
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit may ignore the Slow special rule.

specialRules.hint: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.
specialRules.name: Shield Wall
specialRules.label: Shield Wall
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated place 1 Bot Swarm fully within 6” of this unit.
specialRules.name: Bot Fabricator
specialRules.label: Bot Fabricator
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated place 1 Bot Swarm fully within 6” of this unit.

specialRules.hint: This model counts as having the Psychic(3) rule, and may cast or block up to three spells each round, however for every unmodified result of 1 it takes 3 wounds.
specialRules.name: Psychic Master
specialRules.label: Psychic Master
specialRules.description: This model counts as having the Psychic(3) rule, and may cast or block up to three spells each round, however for every unmodified result of 1 it takes 3 wounds.

specialRules.hint: Whenever a model within 6” would take wounds from Psychic Master, you may put those wounds on this model instead.
specialRules.name: Psychic Warden
specialRules.label: Psychic Warden
specialRules.description: Whenever a model within 6” would take wounds from Psychic Master, you may put those wounds on this model instead.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”, which may ignore wounds from Regeneration on 4+ next time it takes wounds.
specialRules.name: Reanimator
specialRules.label: Reanimator
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”, which may ignore wounds from Regeneration on 4+ next time it takes wounds.

specialRules.hint: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.
specialRules.name: Repair
specialRules.label: Repair
specialRules.description: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.

specialRules.hint: When this model is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”, which may ignore the Slow special rule next time it moves.
specialRules.name: Royal March Order
specialRules.label: Royal March Order
specialRules.description: When this model is activated pick one friendly unit within 12”, which may ignore the Slow special rule next time it moves.

spells.name: Star Bots
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to melee next time it fights.

spells.name: Meteor Bots
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Assault Bots
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 3”.

spells.name: Thunderbolt Bots
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 4 automatic hits.

spells.name: Arrow Bots
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” gets -2 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Fire Bots
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 6 automatic hits with AP(1) each.
